summary: A gang of young thieves flee Paris during the violent aftermath of a political election, only to hole up at an Inn run by neo-Nazis.
cast: Karina Testa|Samuel Le Bihan|Estelle Lefébure|Aurélien Wiik|David Saracino|Chems Dahmani|Maud Forget|Amélie Daure|Rosine Favey|Adel Bencherif|Joël Lefrançois|Patrick Ligardes|Jean-Pierre Jorris|Stéphane Jacquot|Christine Culerier|Hervé Berty|Jean-Jérôme Bertolus|Antoine Coesens|Sandra Dorset|Henri-Pierre Plais|Maiko Vuillod|Patrick Vigne|Yannick Dahan|Jean-Philippe Goudroye
title: Frontera(s)
